name: Multiplicity_interval
documentation: An Interval of Integer, used to represent multiplicity, cardinality and optionality in models.

Multiplicity_range_marker.name: Multiplicity_range_marker
Multiplicity_range_marker.documentation: Marker to use in string form of interval between limits.

Multiplicity_unbounded_marker.name: Multiplicity_unbounded_marker
Multiplicity_unbounded_marker.documentation: Symbol to use to indicate upper limit unbounded.

is_open.name: is_open
is_open.documentation: True if this interval imposes no constraints, i.e. is set to `0..*`.

is_optional.name: is_optional
is_optional.documentation: True if this interval expresses optionality, i.e. `0..1`.

is_mandatory.name: is_mandatory
is_mandatory.documentation: True if this interval expresses mandation, i.e. `1..1`.

is_prohibited.name: is_prohibited
is_prohibited.documentation: True if this interval is set to `0..0`.
